Scripts.OnEnter: local parent = self:GetParent() local myscript = parent:GetScript("OnEnter") if(myscript ~= nil) then myscript(parent) end
Scripts.OnLeave: local parent = self:GetParent() local myscript = parent:GetScript("OnLeave") if(myscript ~= nil) then myscript(parent) end

Scripts.OnLoad: GameTooltip_OnLoad(self) self.shoppingTooltips = {ShoppingTooltip1, ShoppingTooltip2} if (BattlePetTooltip) then BattlePetTooltip:Hide() end
Scripts.OnTooltipSetUnit: if ( self:IsUnit("mouseover") ) then _G[self:GetName().."TextLeft1"]:SetTextColor(GameTooltip_UnitColor("mouseover")) end if (BattlePetTooltip) then BattlePetTooltip:Hide() end
Scripts.OnTooltipSetItem: if (IsModifiedClick("COMPAREITEMS") or (GetCVarBool("alwaysCompareItems") and not self:IsEquippedItem())) then GameTooltip_ShowCompareItem(self, true) else local shoppingTooltip1, shoppingTooltip2 = unpack(self.shoppingTooltips) shoppingTooltip1:Hide() shoppingTooltip2:Hide() end if (BattlePetTooltip) then BattlePetTooltip:Hide() end
Scripts.OnHide: GameTooltip_OnHide(self) ShoppingTooltip1:Hide() ShoppingTooltip2:Hide() if (BattlePetTooltip) then BattlePetTooltip:Hide() end

Scripts.OnEnter: PVPSoundOptions:OptionsShowToopTip(self, "Select a Language for the addon to use.")
PVPSoundOptions:OptionsShowToopTip(self, "Enables or disables the addon completely.")
if UIDropDownMenu_IsEnabled(self) then PVPSoundOptions:OptionsShowToopTip(self, "Select a Sound Pack to use for kill sounds.") end
if UIDropDownMenu_IsEnabled(self) then PVPSoundOptions:OptionsShowToopTip(self, "Select a Language/Type from the Sound Pack to use for kill sounds.") end
if UIDropDownMenu_IsEnabled(self) then PVPSoundOptions:OptionsShowToopTip(self, "Select a Sound Channel to use.") end
if UIDropDownMenu_IsEnabled(self) then PVPSoundOptions:OptionsShowToopTip(self, "Select a mode to use.") end
if UIDropDownMenu_IsEnabled(self) then PVPSoundOptions:OptionsShowToopTip(self, "Select a Sound Pack to use for battleground sounds.") end
if UIDropDownMenu_IsEnabled(self) then PVPSoundOptions:OptionsShowToopTip(self, "Select a Language/Type from the Sound Pack to use for battleground sounds.") end
PVPSoundOptions:OptionsShowToopTip(self, "Enables or disables Multi Kill Sounds.")
